name: Babies Please
description:
A game about managing a factory, where the workers are babies, and your goal is to get back to your family.

This game was made for a game jam, where the theme was a sentence: "I bought a baby clown from the black market of Russian terrorists".

Made by:

Miguel Moreno (programmer)

Sol (art)

Matías Badaloni (game design)

Gian Castro (animator)

Lautaro Gomez (script)

Gabriel Lopez (art)

Lucho Ventura (art)

Marta Rayas (art)

Rocío Sosa (art)

David Toranzo (programmer )
